auth.usernameMin: Username must be at least {0} characters
auth.passwordMin: Password must be at least {0} characters
auth.passwordPattern: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (@$!%*#?&)
auth.usernamePattern: Username must contain only letters, numbers, and underscores
